ygData.subject: Re: Tome of Magi Lor WEB PAGE...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I would personally love to have you run a part of EQFreaks, but alas, Albryno setup the server WITHOUT CGI-Scripting :( only the crappy Microsoft ASP
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I would personally love to have you run a part of EQFreaks, but alas,
Albryno setup the server WITHOUT CGI-Scripting :( only the crappy Microsoft ASP
scripts are available, I have been looking for this instant update sorta thing
in an ASP script also, if anyone knows where to get one, lemme know! I know a
good place for a CGI script if you want it, and its free
-Malvos of The Rathe

Elkantar The Wizard wrote:

> From: "Elkantar The Wizard" <the_elkantar@...>
>
> I wish to create a "Tome of Magi Lor" web page. If you have or know where I
> can get a CGI/HTML script that will allow others to add their comments to
> this web page please let me know. What I am looking for is a CGI data base
> that allows external entries to be added then automatically updates a FAQ
> sheet. The automatic part is a must cause I like to play EQ too much to get
> stuck updating a web page. I can screen the page and omit others. I would
> really like a CIG data base that would allow me to have a login and password
> security that way those pesky fighters could not steal information. Also I
> would be able to track who said what about quests or items to glean more
> info from then if needed.
>
> Elkantar Keeper of the Tome of Magi Lore
>
> _______________________________________________________________
> Get Free Email and Do More On The Web. Visit http://www.msn.com
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
